cards.name: Yavimaya Iconoclast
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Trample
When Yavimaya Iconoclast enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Steel weapons hold a forbidden allure to some of the younger Yavimayans.

foreignNames.name: Yavimaya-Ikonoklastin
foreignNames.text:
Bonus {R} (Du kannst zusätzlich {R} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn die Yavimaya-Ikonoklastin ins Spiel kommt und falls ihre Bonuskosten bezahlt wurden, erhält sie +1/+1 und Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Waffen aus Stahl üben auf einige der jüngeren Yavimayaner den Reiz des Verbotenen aus.

foreignNames.name: Iconoclasta de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
Estímulo {R}. (Puedes pagar {R} adicional al lanzar este hechizo.)
Arrolla.
Cuando la Iconoclasta de Yavimaya entre al campo de batalla, si fue estimulada, obtiene +1/+1 y gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Las armas de acero despiertan una fascinación prohibida en algunos jóvenes de Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: Iconoclaste de la Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
Kick {R} (Vous pouvez payer {R} supplémentaire au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Piétinement
Quand l'Iconoclaste de la Yavimaya arrive sur le champ de bataille, s'il a été kické, il gagne +1/+1 et acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Les armes en acier ont l'attrait de l'interdit pour certains des Yavimayans les plus jeunes.

foreignNames.name: Iconoclasta di Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
Potenziamento {R} (Puoi pagare {R} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Travolgere
Quando l'Iconoclasta di Yavimaya entra nel campo di battaglia, se è stata potenziata, prende +1/+1 e ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Le armi d'acciaio esercitano un fascino proibito sui più giovani di Yavimaya.

foreignNames.name: ヤヴィマヤの偶像破壊者
foreignNames.text:
キッカー{R}（この呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{R}を支払ってもよい。）
トランプル
ヤヴィマヤの偶像破壊者が戦場に出たとき、これがキッカーされていた場合、ターン終了時まで、これは＋１/＋１の修整を受け速攻を得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エルフ
foreignNames.flavor: 鋼の武器は一部の若いヤヴィマヤの民にとって禁断の誘惑である。

foreignNames.name: Iconoclasta de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text:
Reforçar {R} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {R} ao conjurar esta mágica.)
Atropelar
Quando Iconoclasta de Yavimaya entra no campo de batalha, se ela foi reforçada, ela recebe +1/+1 e ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: As armas de aço têm um fascínio proibido para alguns yavimayanos mais jovens.

foreignNames.name: 亚维马雅反逆妖精
foreignNames.text:
增幅{R}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{R}。）
践踏
当亚维马雅反逆妖精进战场时，若它已增幅，则直到回合结束，它得+1/+1且获得敏捷异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 一些年轻的亚维马雅人经不住钢铁兵器的禁忌诱惑。

cards.originalText:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Trample
When Yavimaya Iconoclast enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Yavimaya Sojourner
cards.text: Domain — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: To the long-lived treefolk, the Phyrexians invading again after only three centuries was as though they never left.

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Yavimaya Sojourner). The mana value of the spell is determined by only its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast that spell was.
Yavimaya Sojourner’s first ability can’t reduce the {G} in its cost.
Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

foreignNames.name: Besucher aus Yavimaya
foreignNames.text: Domäne — Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
foreignNames.flavor: Als die Phyrexianer nach nur drei Jahrhunderten eine erneute Invasion begannen, kam es den langlebigen Baumhirten vor, als wären sie nie fort gewesen.

foreignNames.name: Transeúnte de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text: Dominio — Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada tipo de tierra básica entre las tierras que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Para los longevos arbóreos, que los pirexianos volvieran a invadirlos después de tan solo tres siglos fue como si nunca se hubieran marchado.

foreignNames.name: Séjourneur de la Yavimaya
foreignNames.text: Domaine — Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Pour les sylvins à grande longévité, une nouvelle invasion phyrexiane à peine trois siècles après la précédente donnait l'impression qu'ils n'étaient jamais partis.

foreignNames.name: Visitatore di Yavimaya
foreignNames.text: Dominio — Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni tipo di terra base tra le terre che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Per i longevi silvantropi che vedono una nuova invasione dei Phyrexiani dopo appena tre secoli, è come se non fossero mai andati via.

foreignNames.name: ヤヴィマヤの滞留者
foreignNames.text: 版図 — この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしている土地の中の基本土地タイプ１種類につき{1}少なくなる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ツリーフォーク
foreignNames.flavor: 長命なツリーフォークにとって、たったの三世紀で再侵略してくるファイレクシア人はまるで一度も去っていないかのようだった。

foreignNames.name: Visitante de Yavimaya
foreignNames.text: Dominar — Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para ser conjurada para cada tipo de terreno básico entre os terrenos que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Para os seres longevos como os ents, a nova invasão phyrexiana após apenas três séculos era como se eles nunca tivessem ido embora.

foreignNames.name: 亚维马雅旅居者
foreignNames.text: 领土～由你操控的地中每有一种基本地类别，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。
foreignNames.flavor: 在长寿的树妖眼里，刚过三百年就再次进犯的非瑞克西亚人就像是从没离开过一样。

cards.originalText: Domain — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control.

cards.name: Ajani, Sleeper Agent
cards.text:
Compleated ({G/W/P} can be paid with {G}, {W}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.)
[+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
[−3]: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among up to three target creatures. They gain vigilance until end of turn.
[−6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature or planeswalker spell, target opponent gets two poison counters."

rulings.text: A hybrid Phyrexian mana symbol is counted the same way as a normal mana symbol when determining the mana value of a card. Specifically, Ajani’s mana value is always 4, even if you pay {1}{G}{W} and 2 life to cast him.
Phyrexian is not a color nor a type of mana, and players cannot add Phyrexian mana. It’s just a symbol that gives you another way to pay for a spell or ability.

Compleated is a replacement effect, and it applies only to a permanent that is entering the battlefield with loyalty counters. Any other replacement effect that would apply to the number of loyalty counters it enters the battlefield with will apply as normal.

The compleated ability looks only at whether a player chose to pay 2 life for a Phyrexian mana symbol as they were casting the spell. If a player paid life for some other reason while casting the spell, that will not reduce the number of loyalty counters the planeswalker enters the battlefield with.

cards.name: Baird, Argivian Recruiter
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power greater than its base power, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor: "Fear doesn't make you a coward; giving in to it does. Now take up your sword and fight!"

rulings.text: Normally, a creature’s base power and toughness are the power and toughness printed on the card or, for a token, the power and toughness set by the effect that created it. If another effect sets a creature’s power and toughness to specific numbers or values, those become its base power and toughness. If an effect modifies a creature’s power and/or toughness without setting them, that is not included when determining its base power and toughness.

If a creature has a characteristic-defining ability that sets its power and toughness, indicated with a */* or similar in the power and toughness box, that ability is taken into account when determining its base power and toughness.

Some creatures have base power and toughness 0/0 and an ability that gives them a bonus based on some criteria. Those are not characteristic-defining abilities, and that ability doesn’t change its base power and toughness.

cards.name: Bortuk Bonerattle
cards.text: Domain — When Bortuk Bonerattle enters the battlefield, if you cast it, choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card to the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

rulings.text: Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

cards.name: Ertai Resurrected
cards.text:
Flash
When Ertai Resurrected enters the battlefield, choose up to one —
• Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. Its controller draws a card.
• Destroy another target creature or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card.

rulings.text: Activated abilities are written in the form “Cost: Effect.” Some keyword abilities, such as equip and crew, are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities, such as prowess and fabricate, are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggers at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that phase or step occurs.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be targeted. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be targeted. Similarly, the replacement effect that prevents a creature with a stun counter on it from untapping can’t be countered.

foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, ziehst du eine Karte, falls die Kreatur angreifend war. Anderenfalls fügt Garna, Blutfaust von Keld, jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Mal sehen, wer mehr von ihnen tötet, Radha."

foreignNames.name: Garna, puñosangriento de Keld
foreignNames.text: Siempre que otra criatura que controlas muera, roba una carta si estaba atacando. De lo contrario, Garna, puñosangriento de Keld hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor: "A ver quién consigue más muertes, Radha".

foreignNames.name: Garna, poing-de-sang de Keld
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature que vous contrôlez meurt, piochez une carte si elle attaquait. Sinon, Garna, poing-de-sang de Keld inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Voyons qui en tue le plus, Radha. »

foreignNames.name: Garna, Pugno Sanguinario di Keld
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura che controlli muore, pesca una carta se era attaccante. Altrimenti, Garna, Pugno Sanguinario di Keld infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vediamo chi ne abbatte di più, Radha."

foreignNames.name: ケルドの血拳、ガルナ
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしていてこれでないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、それが攻撃していたなら、カード１枚を引く。そうでないなら、ケルドの血拳、ガルナは各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・狂戦士
foreignNames.flavor: 「ラーダ、誰がたくさん殺せるか勝負しよう。」

foreignNames.name: Garna, Punho Sangrento de Keld
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que outra criatura que você controla morrer, compre um card se ela estava atacando. Caso contrário, Garna, Punho Sangrento de Keld, causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor: "Radha, vamos ver quem mata mais."

foreignNames.name: 凯尔顿血拳加娜
foreignNames.text: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，如果它正进行攻击，则抓一张牌。若否，则凯尔顿血拳加娜向每位对手各造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「拉妲，我们来比比谁的人头更多。」

cards.originalText: Whenever another creature you control dies, draw a card if it was attacking. Otherwise, Garna, Bloodfist of Keld deals 1 damage to each opponent.
